original_text: Now Jesus learned that the Pharisees had heard that he was gaining and baptizing more disciples than John—
korean_text: 예수께서 제자를 삼고 세례를 베푸시는 것이 요한보다 많다 하는 말을 바리새인들이 들은 줄을 주께서 아신지라

sentences.original_text: that he was gaining and baptizing
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 얻고 세례를 주고 있다는 것을
